release_note: The source code has been updated to Telegram version 10.7.0: Saved Messages 2.0 View Saved Messages by Chat Tags for Saved Messages Saved Messages in Shared Media Upgraded Search Faster Loading Time and High Quality Stories New design for shared contacts Improved Video Messages.
The source code has been updated to Telegram version 10.6.3: Video messages fixes

The source code has been updated to Telegram version 10.6.2: Self destructing Voice and Video Messages Pause During Recording Updated Saved Messages Limit Who You Can Receive Private Messages From Message Reading Time in Private Chats Premium Subscribers Can See Last Seen of Other Users.
The source code has been updated to Telegram version 10.5.2: Upgraded Calls Thanos Snap Effect when Deleting Messages.

New from Telegram The source code has been updated to Telegram version 10.4.0: Channel Appearance Share Posts in Stories View Reposts and More Photo Cutouts for Stories Similar Channels Reposting Stories Video Messages on Stories Profile Colors Wallpapers for Both Sides Story Stats for Channels Custom Reactions for Channels Code Highlighting in Messages Improvements for Topics Thanos Snap Effects. New from iMe Bug fixes and improvements.
The source code has been updated to Telegram version 10.2.6 Bug fixes topics and recent chats refactoring.

New from Telegram The source code has been updated to Telegram version 10.2.5: Telegram premium giveaways Creating giveaways Paying for giveaways More boosts for users. New from iMe General The catalog of channels and groups was removed for refactoring The Send button was returned on the forwarding screen instead of Apply changes Ability to disable color replies the option is in Settings Tools Messages Color replies. Crypto wallet Attractor Testnet Shapley launch Attractor giveaway extension.
The source code has been updated to Telegram version 10.2.2: Replies 2.0 Quote Formatting Adjustable Link Previews Reply Forwarding and Link Settings Account Colors Story Improvements Bug fixes.
The source code has been updated to Telegram version 10.2.0: Replies 2.0 Quote Formatting Adjustable Link Previews Reply Forwarding and Link Settings Account Colors Story Improvements.

General App optimization freezes bugs and crashes fixes as well as other improvements. Crypto wallet TON Fragment integration: Username purchases Anonymous number purchases Purchase and gifts of Telegram Premium Fragment NFT displaying.

Stickers panel settings: Ability to disable Kikliko GIF stickers and emoji sections Action is available via longtap on a section in the sticker panel or in Settings Tools Chats Stickers panel You can hide any 3 sections out of 4 Improvements: Bug and crashes fixes Local pins optimization The cross account forwarding was removed due to the impossibility of stable implementing.

New from Telegram The source code has been updated to Telegram version 10.1.1: Stories for channels Reaction stickers in Stories Your music in Stories View once media New login alerts Dozens of bug fixes and optimizations. New from iMe General App optimization for iOS 17 Ability to enable folders displaying to the left of sorting tabs Settings Folders Groups tab was added to the Catalog Dozens of bug fixes and improvements.
iOS 17 optimization and other minor bug fixes

New from Telegram The source code has been updated to Telegram version 10.0.3: Bug fixes and improvements. New from iMe General Pinning messages: Now the list of pinned messages in chat is divided into 2 sections: General and My the switcher is located in 3 dots Locally pinned messages in chats even where you do not have rights are displayed in My section in the list of pinned messages The new tab Pinned messages was added to the chats auto sorting which displays all the chats in which you have made local pins The Pinned Messages tab appears in chats auto sorting settings after the first local pin has been created Members sorting in groups: The new filter for members with Premium Telegram Improvements bug fixes as well as the birth of new ones.

New from Telegram The source code has been updated to Telegram version 10.0.2: Bug fixes and improvements. New from iMe General Albums improvements: Fast saving of messages to Albums via the Cloud button in the messages context menu Ability to convert a private channel into an Album and vice versa via 3 dots in chat profile The chat counters were added to topics from iMe Settings Topics Bug fixes and improvements. Crypto Wallet 1inch Fusion Integration: Now when swapping tokens for more than 5 you will not need to pay for gas in native coin When swapping tokens for less than 5 it works by the previous conditions with gas payment The swap of ETH BNB MATIC and FTM native coins works by the previous conditions with gas payment The Swap button was added to token details Bug fixes and improvements in the CryptoBoxes functionality.

New from Telegram The source code has been updated to Telegram version 10.0.1: Stories for all users the ability to publish Stories is provided by Telegram gradually Bug fixes and improvements. General Messages context menu settings: Disable unused buttons in the context menu The option is located in Settings Tools Messages Context menu Fast forwarding to Albums was added when clicking on Cloud in the messages context menu The chat counters were added on the folder creation screen Chat preview in account preview refactoring The ability to disable the contacts synchronization during the first authorization in the app was added The confirmation with description when hiding chats to Subarchive was added Bug fixes. Crypto Wallet Bug fixes and improvements in the CryptoBoxes functionality.

General Refactoring of the Tools section with division into categories iMe settings search: iMe options were added to the general search for Telegram options in the profile settings More: The new item Forward to Cloud was added to the messages context menu The new Premium filter was added to contacts sorting A large number of iMe and Telegram bug fixes general optimization. Crypto Wallet Cryptoboxes: Create CryptoBoxes in your groups and channels so your subscribers could participate in receiving rewards Participation in the CryptoBox can only be accepted by a member of the group or channel in which the Cryptobox is located and also the participant must use iMe app with linked crypto wallet address The number of tokens per participant the number of participants as well as the distributed token are chosen by the creator of the CryptoBox when creating The participant does not need to pay gas to get the reward because the gas is paid in advance by the creator of the cryptobox when it is created. All networks displaying: Select All networks in the list of networks to display all tokens from all networks on one screen You can configure the displaying of networks in the crypto wallet settings Interface Networks.

New from Telegram The source code has been updated to Telegram version 9.6.5: Stories for Premium users and other improvements. New from iMe General The ability to disable Stories with a choice of parameters the settings are located in the My Stories section 3 dots The ability to switch the API for Telegram ID displaying by a long tap on ID in chat profiles Albums tab was added to the main chat list.

New from Telegram The source code has been updated to Telegram version 9.6.5: Stories for Premium users and other improvements. New from iMe General The ability to disable Stories with a choice of parameters the settings are located in the My Stories section 3 dots The ability to switch the API for Telegram ID displaying by a long tap on ID in chat profiles Albums tab was added to the main chat list.

General Alternative formatting panels: WEB panel with compact functions displaying Panel in the form of keyboard for full screen text editing Ability to switch the panel type when making a long tap on Aa You can change the formatting panel in Settings Tools Messages section Extended settings for Telegram ID: Settings by chat types Ability to completely disable Telegram ID You can set up the displaying in Settings Tools Telegram ID Chat sorting: The Drafts tab was added for the main and archive chat lists The Albums tab was added which can now be enabled for the main list of chats Bug fixes and general optimization. Crypto Wallet Simplified authorization: Now it is much more easier and faster to create or import a wallet Wallet screens redesign General wallet optimization Improved balance displaying of low priced tokens Bug fixes and other improvements.

General Alternative formatting panels: WEB panel with compact functions displaying Panel in the form of keyboard for full screen text editing Ability to switch the panel type when making a long tap on Aa You can change the formatting panel in Settings Tools Messages section Extended settings for Telegram ID: Settings by chat types Ability to completely disable Telegram ID You can set up the displaying in Settings Tools Telegram ID Chat sorting: The Drafts tab was added for the main and archive chat lists The Albums tab was added which can now be enabled for the main list of chats Bug fixes and general optimization. Crypto Wallet Simplified authorization: Now it is much more easier and faster to create or import a wallet Wallet screens redesign General wallet optimization Improved balance displaying of low priced tokens Bug fixes and other improvements.

General Alternative formatting panels: WEB panel with compact functions displaying Panel in the form of keyboard for full screen text editing Ability to switch the panel type when making a long tap on Aa You can change the formatting panel in Settings Tools Messages section Extended settings for Telegram ID: Settings by chat types Ability to completely disable Telegram ID You can set up the displaying in Settings Tools Telegram ID Chat sorting: The Drafts tab was added which is global for the main and archive chat lists The Albums tab was added which can now be enabled for the main list of chats Bug fixes and general optimization. Crypto Wallet Simplified authorization: Now it is much more easier and faster to create or import a wallet Wallet screens redesign General wallet optimization Improved balance displaying of low priced tokens Bug fixes and other improvements.

Crypto Wallet All tokens support: Full support for all tokens for Ethereum BNB Chain Polygon Fantom and TRON blockchains Automatic displaying of tokens with a positive balance Ability to add custom tokens by smart contract address that are not included in iMe database iMe database includes all tokens from the CoinMarketCap database except for invalid tokens The tokens synchronization was added to all your devices.

Crypto Wallet All tokens support: Full support for all tokens for Ethereum BNB Chain Polygon Fantom and TRON blockchains Automatic displaying of tokens with a positive balance Ability to add custom tokens by smart contract address that are not included in iMe database iMe database includes all tokens from the CoinMarketCap database except for invalid tokens The tokens synchronization was added to all your devices.

General Bug fixes and general optimization. Crypto Wallet Bitcoin blockchain integration: Non custodial storage of BTC Transfers within the Bitcoin network Support of the main BTC coin If your already have an EVM wallet then Bitcoin network will be displayed automatically with the same seed phrase as on the EVM compatible networks Bitcoin support in Binance Pay functionality.
9.6.3 Telegram source code version Hidden chats BTCMT token support from Minto project: BTCMT added on BNB Chain network BTCMT swaps via PancakeSwap BTCMT staking program from the 15th of May 2023.

New from Telegram The source code has been updated to Telegram version 9.6.3: Shareable chat folders Custom wallpapers Better bots Fast scrolling for attachments Read time in topics Improved interfaces. New from Telegram General Hidden chats: Hiding chats in Subarchive To enter the Subarchive with a hidden section pull down the list of chats in the Archive down Hidden chats are not displayed in chat lists and search The option to hide the chat is located at 3 dots in the chat profile Bug fixes and optimization. Crypto Wallet WalletConnect improvements.

General Twitter 2.0: Displaying media files in tweets Translation of tweets via 3 dots Discord integration: Linking your Discord server to Telegram account Linking Discord server to your groups and channels View Discord channels on linked resources Recent chats: Settings with chat types Settings for displaying counters and reactions Improved forwarding: Now the sorting tabs are displayed in the forwarding window Simplified authorization instead of iMeWalletBot : Required for new iMe users to use platform functionality for free Without user actions Without switching to iMe bot Various fixes and improvements. Crypto Wallet TRON support in Binance Pay functionality.
iMe for iOS has been updated to version 9.5.4! General The issue when the app failed to launch if you use only folders was fixed Minor improvements and fixes. Thank you for using iMe!

The source code has been updated to Telegram version 9.5.3: Power Saving Mode Granular Playback Speed Read Time in Small Groups Auto Send Invite Links Dynamic Order for Sticker Packs Translated Bot Descriptions Improved folder support New Animated Emoji New Interactive Emoji and Reactions The Great Bug Hunt. General Twitter integration: Linking your Twitter account to Telegram account Linking Twitter to your groups and channels View Twitter feed on linked resources Disabling popular emoji suggestions Translator: Displaying the list of recently used languages in the translator window Privacy settings: Now you can choose the setting so nobody could invite you to a group or channel even your contacts Multi quoting Crypto Wallet Transfer of coins by Twitter username My staking filters by statuses.

Login by QR code: When logging into account now you can click on the QR code icon to scan it from another device like in Desktop and Web versions . You can open the QR code scanner from Settings Devices Connect device or click 3 dots in the toolbar. Crypto Wallet: Added support for PPM token by PUNKPANDA.

GENERAL The source code has been updated to Telegram version 9.4.1: Profile picture maker Full chat translation for Telegram Premium users Search by emoji categories Redesigned network usage Auto save to camera roll Granular media permissions for group admins Re login with Apple and Google ID New animated emoji and interactive emoji. CRYPTO WALLET Fantom support in Binance Pay service.

iMe for iOS has been updated to version 9.3.2! General Hotfix of the issue with launching the app on older iOS versions. Sorry for the inconvenience! Crypto Wallet Fantom integration EVM compatible network .

GENERAL Ability to log in by scanning a QR code from another active device Bug fixes and optimization. CRYPTO WALLET Release Staking 2.0 iMe Staking Platform with the ability to add partner staking programs Partners and projects wishing to launch iMe staking programs for their tokens can send their applications to us in support of iMeMessenger Profitability calculator for staking programs Import wallet via15 18 and 21 words in addition to the previous one via 12 and 24 Max button when exchanging tokens Disabling banners and currency quotes by long pressing them Various improvements.

The source code has been updated to Telegram version 9.3: Hidden Media Zero Storage Usage New Drawing and Text Tools Profile Pictures for Your Contacts Public Profile Pictures Hiding Group Members New Animated Emoji More Interactive Emoji Topics for Groups of Any Size.

New from Telegram The source code has been updated to Telegram version 9.2.1: Sign up without a SIM card Auto Delete All Chats Ultimate Privacy Topics 2.0 Aggressive Anti Spam Temporary QR codes Emoji search New Custom Interactive Emoji. New from iMe General Quoting a user when selecting a part of the text of his or her message The ability to set up folder icons in the center of the screen width New tab Secret chats in sorting chats Extended context menu of chat avatar by long tap on the logo on the right in the toolbar in a chat Improved Music section: hiding chats deleting playlists by long tap A large number of bug fixes. Crypto Wallet The Open Network TON integration Creation and import of TON addresses Storage and receipt of Toncoin Toncoin transfers by address and QR code Toncoin transfers to Telegram contacts and directly in chats Blockchain section in the form of active sessions in crypto account settings.
iMe for iOS has been updated to version 9.1.2! General Optimization and bug fixes. Crypto wallet WalletConnect is now optimized for DAO Maker signatures.

Changelog: Music 2.0: Now you can add tracks to your favorites in each chat Create playlists and listen to music in a convenient format Ability to pin the player Added To the end of the list button in recent actions for admins Expanding multi panel items in Telegram themes Optimization of combining messages in Telegram topics Tab Albums in the Archive can now be disabled Fixes of bugs.

iMe for iOS updated to version 9.1.0! New from Telegram The source code has been updated to Telegram version 9.1.0: Topics in groups Collectible usernames Voice to text for video messages Premium New emoji packs Redesigned night mode Minor design improvements New interactive emoji and reactions. New from iMe General Improved calls The message context menu by double tap with disabled reactions was returned Deleting several chats from both interlocutors Bug fixes.

iMe for iOS updated to version 9.0.2! General The ability to export your Telegram contacts to your device Templates were added to bots The ability to hide statuses and badges in Telegram Premium settings A lot of fixes and improvements. Crypto Wallet First LIME staking for BNB Chain and Polygon networks Improvements for WalletConnect PIN code entry redesign.

iMe for iOS has been updated to version 9.0.1! New from Telegram Source code updated to version Telegram 9.0.1: Infinite reactions Emoji statuses Improved login flow New username links. New from iMe Switching Instant View: tap to read and hold to change the link The option to disable reactions by chat types was refactored Donate button was added to the attachment menu of groups and channels Neurobots were cut off for refactoring Fixed bugs and something else invisible to your eyes.

iMe for iOS has been updated to version 8.9.2! New from iMe The bar of recent chats in the form of avatars at the top of the chat list. Pin unlimited recent chats for quick access! You can enable the option in the tools settings The secret ingredient to a good update is a tablespoon of bug fixes. Crypto wallet The integration of the Symbiosis cross chain bridge for LIME swap on BNB Chain and Polygon networks LIME listing on Symbiosis Wallet optimization.

Crypto Wallet MAX button in the transfer window to select the maximum amount of tokens Switching the given and received tokens in the swap window.

iMe for iOS has been updated to version 8.8.4! New from iMe New iMe widget with the most important features: Wallet Catalog Music and Albums Chats preview when forwarding Improved account preview and chats in it Chat sorting in 3 dots when creating a folder or topic Options settings in Telegram Premium section Context menu with options in the Groups profile Members section Voice to text is now not only for incoming messages but also for outgoing for users without a Premium account up to 60 sec Enable disable preview in the GIF context menu Topics context menu is now the same as for folders Changing the system scale and font support in the application interface Quick access to tools section via 3 dots on the chat list Fixes fixes fixes... Crypto Wallet 1inch DEX aggregator is integrated into iMe wallet which provides the best swap rates Now you can see your avatar next to your address in the wallet.

New from iMe New sorting tabs: Mentions Live Chats Deleted Accounts Clearing files cache via context menu iMe Premium icons available for all users Refactoring of one line and two line modes for the list of chats Refactoring of account notification settings Fixes fixes fixes... Crypto Wallet Integration of Uniswap V3 on Polygon Switching networks on the WalletConnect screen.

General Combining messages sent within 30 seconds Detailed contacts sorting Photo copying now you can copy a photo in 3 dots and paste it into a message Selecting the size of stickers appearance The multi panel is now automatically hidden when scrolling a chat it is convenient Now you can put a sticker gif on an avatar from the context menu Installing NFT on the avatar! Crypto Wallet NFT tokens support: in the first version only NFT Avatars from iMe on Polygon network Refactoring and optimization.

General Channel catalog now you can find what to read directly in iMe in the main menu without the need to search for Telegram channels on the Internet Now when you make a long press on GIF sticker you can enable disable its preview The option to clear cache is added to multipanel Now the chat profile has a search pole for languages in the translator! Also a lot of different tiny things invisible to the eye were fixed. The application will now work sweetly and smoothly. At least that s what the developers say.

The source code has been updated to Telegram version 8.6: Download Manager New Attachment Menu Redesigned Login Flow Phone Number Links Live Streaming With Other Apps New t.me Pages General Templates in chats create frequently used messages for quick sending in chats Users and chats search by QR code The forwarding style is now like in Telegram but with some additional iMe options Error fixes Crypto Wallet Updated design in iOS 15 style Improved WalletConnect Node stabilization.

This update is like a general cleaning in the house: we have fixed a lot of bugs and worked on general optimization. In general now everything is beautiful and in its place. Making transactions in groups and channels.

The source code has been updated to Telegram version 8.5.1: Video Stickers Better Reactions New Reactions and Interactive Emoji Navigating Recent Chats Translator in Instant View Improved call quality and more More details General Setting up attachment in chats in Tools section Setting menu items by long tap Disabling Quick Reaction when you double tap on a message Crypto wallet Connecting via WalletConnect which allows your wallet to connect and interact with DApps Uniswap PancakeSwap iMe Bridge etc. and other wallets MetaMask Trust etc. Disabling AiPoint balance Sending tokens screen redesign.

Disabling reactions in the messages context menu Settings Tools Reactions Improvement and optimization of videos with sound from KikLiko Separation of the Media tab into Photos and Videos in chat search section Short posts and Actions when swiping options were removed Crypto wallet Polygon network and support for WETH WMATIC USDC USDT WBTC DAI QUICK AAVE GNS SOL MANA LINK GHST were added.

What s new: Now there is more fun in chats Integration of video collections with sound from KikLiko for sending in chats along with GIFs For cryptofans Current gas price displaying for ETH and BNB Twisted here tightened there Bug fixes and optimization.

GENERAL The source code has been updated to Telegram version 7.9.1: New options by long tap on user s avatar in groups: Mention by name User messages Make a transaction Quick on off notifications on accounts Enabling quick actions for user menu and messages in appearance settings opening by short tap instead of long tap Separate tabs for Private and Public groups have been added to chat sorting Actions for sorting tabs by long tap on the icon Option to hide cloud folders in folder settings iMe social networks in the Help section of the settings menu Fixes and improvements CRYPTO WALLET The new UFI token from the PureFi project was added History button to display all transactions in a single list Updates of balances when pulling the main screen of the wallet down Displaying the fees for pending transactions Optimization.

GENERAL The source code has been updated to Telegram version 7.8.4: New mechanism for password recovery Sending messages animation Sound support in screen broadcasting Screen animation for entering local password Animated Start messaging button in the intro Zooming while recording video messages with two fingers Switching accounts when forwarding messages Fixes and improvements CRYPTO WALLET 18 new tokens were added Switching ERC20 and BEP20 networks to separate token balances displaying Total tokens balance Ability to hide balances Token settings enabling disabling changing order filters by positive balances The system of levels for users with an activated crypto wallet which is focused on LIME balance Option for transaction cancellation if it is still pending Saving a passphrase in the form of a QR code with the ability to print it Restoring and importing a crypto wallet by scanning a passphrase QR code.

New from Telegram The source code has been updated to version Telegram 7.1.1: Filters for search Anonymous administrators in groups Comments in channels and more New from iMe Topics for chats: Organize your chats by adding Topics for this in chat profiles or immediately as a list via the Edit button Button in the toolbar to show or hide the Topics panel Multipanel in chats: Buttons hidden in the chat profile are now quickly accessible on the Multipanel Enabling and disabling the Multipanel in Settings Appearance Hide your profile data in Settings Appearance Select front or rear camera before starting video message recording Disable the bottom notification bar in channels.

iMe Messenger for iOS has been updated to Telegram version 7.0.1! VIDEO CALLS VIDEO AVATARS IMPROVED PEOPLE NEARBY 2GB FILE SHARING AND MORE Finally video calls first version Ultra secure and fast video calls. Increased limits for sending files Share and store unlimited files of any type up to 2GB. Profile video Set a profile video instead of a static image. Improved people nearby See how far away you are when someone contacts you through the People Nearby screen. Thumbnails group statistics and more Media preview for messages. View detailed statistics for large groups you own. Option to set a toggle in privacy settings to automatically archive and mute all new chats from non contacts. Send a soccer emoji to see if you ve scored a goal. Errors have been corrected including those of the translator.
Read all button for the Unread chats tab. Read all item when you long press the tab icon. Fixed an issue with the Personal Chats tab. Bug fixes.

iMe source code has been updated to the official Telegram client version 6.2 all missing updates are included: Cloud folders Attention! Old groupings of chats into local folders will be deleted! Updated sorting of chats by type: All Unread Personal Groups Channels Bots Google Translator integrated Display user ID in profile Ported from previous version of iMe Neurobot store Neurobots in chats for quick answers in Russian and English Catalog of channels by category and country Forwarding messages without an author Set of iMe icons for iPhone desktop
New Year s iMe icon with Santa Claus hat default New Year s iMe icon with snowflakes in Chat Settings Happy New Year!!!
Forwarding messages without mentioning the author Transferring the recovery of purchases to the store Push notifications indicating the sender Bug fixing
Added support for iPad tablets Improved notifications Fixed bugs audio playback freezing sharing a file via iMe rating in the store a bug with displaying neurobots etc.

Update to Telegram version 5.11. Added all features from versions 5.7 5.8 5.8.1 5.9 5.9.1 5.10 5.11 including: Delayed and silent messages Animated stickers and emoji Creation of cloud themes and advanced settings Location based chats Transfer of rights of the creator Ability to apply formatting and hyperlinks in the text New privacy settings and much more. Additionally: The neurobot store has been replenished with new characters Added new categories and channels in the Selection Added a set for changing iMe application icons for different smartphone desktop wallpapers.
